biotools.summary:
Identification and analysis of long non-coding RNA related miRNA sponge regulatory network in bladder urothelial carcinoma.

transcriptome-wide microRNA target prediction including lncRNAs.

miRcode 11 (June 2012) based on: UCSC GRCh37/hg19, GENCODE 11 transcripts, Multiz 46 species, TargetScan6 families.

MiRcode provides "whole transcriptome" human microRNA target predictions based on the comprehensive GENCODE gene annotation, including >10,000 long non-coding RNA genes.
